full_summary:
____________________________________________________________________
# Tender Announcement: Rotary Chair 

**Title:** Rotary Chair

**Reference Number:** cb-777-97745378

**Amendment Number:** 6

**Solicitation Number:** 10232387

**Publication Date:** 2023-12-07

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-18 14:00:00

**Contract Value:**

- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-19
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

**Tender Status:**
The tender has been Cancelled.

**UNSPSC Codes:** 

- 56101504 - Chairs
- 56101700 - Office furniture

**Procurement Category:**  
- Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Type:**  
- Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA)

**Procurement Method:**  
- Competitive - Selective tendering

**Selection Criteria:**  
- Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:**  
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**  
- Canada

**Regions of Delivery:**  
- Gatineau, National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity:**  
- Canadian Heritage

**Contact Information:**

- Name: Martin Lafleur
- Title: A/Procurement Advisor
- Department: Canadian Heritage
- Address: 15 Eddy St, 9th floor, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0M5
- Email: contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca

**Tender Description:**
The Canadian Heritage department has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating at 200 rue Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, QC, J8X 4C6 by March 31st, 2024. The requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to pre-qualified general stream SA holders and non-SA holders with an arrangement.

**Eligibility Criteria:**

- Suppliers must be pre-qualified and have a Supply Arrangement (SA)
- Non-SA holders must submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority for evaluation
- Suppliers must comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Process to become a pre-qualified SA holder:**

- Visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://buyandsell.gc.ca/proc
